description: You find $500 on the street. - Receive $500.
You find $1000 on the street. - Receive $1000.
You find 1 unit of Morphine in a public restroom. - Receive 1 unit of Morphine.
You find 1 unit of Cocaine in a public restroom. - Receive 1 unit of Cocaine.
You find 1 unit of LSD in a public restroom. - Receive 1 unit of LSD.
You run into the police who detain you. - Pay a fine of 500$.
Oh no! One of your rivals has stolen 2 units of Morphine from your inventory. - You lose 2 units of Morphine.
One of your fellow drug dealers needs your assistance to secure their release from jail. - Pay their bail-out $500.
Oh oh!!! The police have caught your hash supplier! Now you're worried about being exposed. - Pay 1000$ to keep him quiet.
You encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. - You receive nothing; he was completely broke!
You got caught, but you ain't no snitch, Vato! Stay silent! Wait for 1 round and pay a fine of $1100. - Wait for 1 round and pay a fine of $1100.
One of your fellow drug dealers needs your assistance to secure their release from jail. - Pay their bail-out $500.
You encounter a junkie who is completely out of it! You rob him and take his money. - Receive $400.
